question.title: Errorï¼šCould not locate SurfaceTextureWrapper.shouldUpdate method
question.body:
I want to upgrade Flutter from 3.19.2 to 3.22 and run the resulting code on an Android project, but I encountered an error:

[ERROR:flutter/shell/platform/android/platform_view_android_jni_impl.cc(1163)] 
Could not locate SurfaceTextureWrapper.shouldUpdate method

Now I know what caused it: After Flutter 3.22, the Flutter embedding implementation for PlatformView has added a new JNI interface, SurfaceTextureWrapper.shouldUpdate, to support more precise texture control. If certain third-party libraries or plugins implement a custom PlatformView, or engage in interactions related to SurfaceTexture on the Android side, they may need to implement or support this new method. But many packages do not do that.

New implementation interface in flutterEmbedded layer Code submission record: https://github.com/flutter/engine/pull/49653

I need some suggestions.

question_comments.body: Please clarify your specific problem or provide additional details to highlight exactly what you need. As it's currently written, it's hard to tell exactly what you're asking.
